III.i.1.B.2.e
.
Determining Travel Time for PHS Claimants
For PHS claimants, accept the dates shown on the separation document as including travel time.
The PHS determines travel time prior to separation and includes it in the active duty dates.
title: M21-1, Part III, Subpart i, Chapter 1, Section B - Service Requirements and Verification of Eligibility
citation: Part III, Subpart i, Chapter 1, Section B
